headline: How pot farmers are preparing for a price crash
deck: California’s multibillion-dollar cannabis agriculture sector promises to be upended by the historic drawdown of prohibition. Legalization would bring huge changes to pot producers.

headline: Emojicon brings familiar text-message characters to life
deck: Past the photobooth with the hats shaped like a grinning pile of poop was a room full of linguists, artists and technocrats discussing the evolution of a new language: emoji.

headline: Lockheed satellite system aids tornado, sun storm warnings
deck: Weather forecasters can now provide about 15 minutes of warning before a tornado hits an area, but an advanced satellite detection system developed in Palo Alto could increase that to 30 minutes.
